classinfo.title: Classifier
classinfo.summary:
A formal characteristic of an entry, such as language, general material designation, or publication type. For display purposes assimilated to subject headings or similar classifications.
Differs from subject headings by being better controlled and taken from a much smaller vocabulary, thus able to control processing. Examples are indicators for review, festschrift, biography, which all imply a subject person or publication, or language together with a uniform title which implies a translation.
